verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when they had passed <S%G1353>through<s%> <S%G295>Amphipolis<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G624>Apollonia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

<S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G1486>was<s%> his <S%G1486>custom,<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> Sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%> <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>

<S%G1272>explaining<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3908>demonstrating<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1163>had<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rise <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> were <S%G3982>persuaded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4345>joined<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas,<s%> <S%G5037>of<s%> the <S%G4576>devout<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> of the <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1135>women.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G544>unpersuaded<s%> <S%G2453%G99999>Jews<s%> took <S%G4355>along<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> from the <S%G60>marketplace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gathering <S%G2532>a<s%> <S%G3792>crowd,<s%> set <S%G2350>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> in an <S%G2350>uproar.<s%> <S%G2186>Assaulting<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> they <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G71>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1218>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> they <S%G4951>dragged<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the rulers of the <S%G4173>city,<s%> <S%G994>crying,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G3754>who<s%> have <S%G387>turned<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> upside <S%G387>down<s%> have <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1759>here<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> has <S%G5264>received.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4238>act<s%> <S%G561>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus!<s%>"
<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the rulers of the <S%G4173>city<s%> were <S%G5015>troubled<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>
<S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G2425>security<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest,<s%> they <S%G630>let<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G630>go.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G5037>sent<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1599>away<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G960>Beroea.<s%> When <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G3854>arrived,<s%> they <S%G549>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

Now <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> more <S%G2104>noble<s%> than <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> in <S%G3748>that<s%> they <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> readiness of the <S%G4288>mind,<s%> <S%G350>examining<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250>daily<s%> to see <S%G1487>whether<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G3779>so.<s%>

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3767%G99999>therefore<s%> <S%G4100>believed;<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2158>prominent<s%> <S%G1674>Greek<s%> <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G435>men.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> had <S%G1097>knowledge<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G960>Beroea<s%> <S%G2546>also,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> there <S%G2532>likewise,<s%> <S%G4531>agitating<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> sent <S%G1821>out<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> as far <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G1161%G99999>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G5278>still<s%> <S%G5278>stayed<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2525>escorted<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G116>Athens.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2983>Receiving<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> that they <S%G2443>should<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5613>very<s%> <S%G5033>quickly,<s%> they <S%G1826>departed.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> while <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1551>waited<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G116>Athens,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G3947>provoked<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5607>as<s%> he <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> full of <S%G2712>idols.<s%>

<S%G3303>So<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1256>he<s%> reasoned <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the devout <S%G4576>persons,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>marketplace<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> met <S%G3909>him.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> of the <S%G1946>Epicurean<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4770>Stoic<s%> <S%G5386>philosophers<s%> also were <S%G4820>conversing<s%> with <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101%G99999>"What<s%> <S%G2309>does<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4691>babbler<s%> want to <S%G1161>say?<s%>" <S%G3588>Others<s%> <S%G1380>said,<s%> "He seems to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2604>advocating<s%> <S%G3581>foreign<s%> <S%G1140>deities,<s%>" <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

<S%G5037>They<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> hold of <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G697>Areopagus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1410>"May<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>teaching<s%> <S%G5259>is,<s%> which is <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by <S%G4675>you?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you <S%G1533>bring<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3579>strange<s%> things <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>ears.<s%> We want <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1511>mean.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G117>Athenians<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G3588>living<s%> <S%G1927>there<s%> spent their <S%G2119>time<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2087>else,<s%> but <S%G2228>either<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> new <S%G2537>thing.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G697>Areopagus,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> "You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G117>Athens,<s%> I <S%G2334>perceive<s%> that <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5613>are<s%> very <S%G1174>religious<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> as I passed <S%G1330>along,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G333>observed<s%> the objects of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4574>worship,<s%> I <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> an <S%G1041>altar<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G1924>inscription:<s%> <S%G57><s%> 'TO AN UNKNOWN <S%G2316>GOD.<s%>' <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G2151>worship<s%> in <S%G50>ignorance,<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2605>announce<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%>

The <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G3778>he,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3485>temples<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands,<s%>

<S%G3761>neither<s%> is he <S%G2323>served<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>'s <S%G5495>hands,<s%> as though he <S%G4326>needed<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> seeing <S%G846>he<s%> himself <S%G1325>gives<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4157>breath,<s%> <S%G2596>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G5037>He<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> from <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4383>surface<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> having <S%G3724>determined<s%> <S%G4384>appointed<s%> <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3734>boundaries<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2733>dwellings,<s%>

that they should <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686><s%> <S%G1065>perhaps<s%> they might reach out <S%G5584>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2544>though<s%> he <S%G5225>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G2257>us.<s%>

<S%G1063><s%> 'For <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> we <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2795>move,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have our <S%G2070>being.<s%>' <S%G5613>As<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> your <S%G5209>own<s%> <S%G4163>poets<s%> have <S%G2046>said,<s%> <S%G1063><s%> 'For we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> his <S%G1085>offspring.<s%>'

<S%G5225>Being<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to think <S%G3543>that<s%> the Divine <S%G2304>Nature<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G696>silver,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G5480>engraved<s%> by <S%G5078>art<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1761>design<s%> of <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G3303><s%> The <S%G5550>times<s%> of <S%G52>ignorance<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5237>overlooked.<s%> <S%G3588>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> he <S%G3853>commands<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> should <S%G3340>repent,<s%>

<S%G1360>because<s%> he has <S%G2476>appointed<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G3724>ordained;<s%> of which he has <S%G3930>given<s%> <S%G4102>assurance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G450>men,<s%> in that he has raised <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G5512>mocked;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>others<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> "We want to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4012%G99999>concerning<s%> <S%G5127>this.<s%>"
<S%G3779>Thus<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2853>joined<s%> with <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> whom <S%G3739>also<s%> <S%G2532>was<s%> <S%G1354>Dionysius<s%> the <S%G698>Areopagite,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1152>Damaris,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
